revised_title: Rene Descartes and His Influence on the Early Royal Society
tldr: The article explores the influence of Rene Descartes on the early Royal Society and his contribution to the modern attack on scholastic philosophy. Descartes' complete system of natural knowledge helped shape the climate of opinion during the birth of the first scientific academies. His ideas and doctrines had a significant impact on the early Royal Society, and his work laid the foundation for future scientific advancements.
